pages.description: This the offical achivment book of Mystical Survival

pages.achievement: Craft a hammer, sieve, and a mesh -Maybe the roots will help you-
Smelt gold dust into ingot, along with 5 iron
Craft a tinkers pickaxe, using iron, wood, and paper
Craft a mana pool, and fill it
Change the wording of achievement id 4 in the Achievement Book Demo
Reorder the achievements on page 2 of the Achievement Book Demo
